Class QuestionPanel.PointsListener

java.lang.Object
jep.QuestionPanel.PointsListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
Enclosing class:
QuestionPanel
private class QuestionPanel.PointsListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Class PointsListener the listener that controls all functions related to giving and taking points
Version:
3/2/2020
Author:
Phoenix
